Name: Yoe
description:
Yoe, 28 years old, lives with his spouse and his house is located in the hamlet of Harango, Ja√©n. Yoe has worked growing organic coffee for 10 years, which he sells through a local cooperative. In addition, he has other income from raising and selling small animals.

Yoe will use the loan to purchase organic soil amendments and to pay laborers to weed the coffee.
